thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Devoteam FY Operating Income Up At 43.9 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Devoteam FY Operating Income Up At 43.9 Million Euros
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - DEVOTEAM SA:
* FY REVENUE EUR 540.4 MILLION VERSUS EUR 479.4 MILLION (RESTATED) YEAR AGO
* FY OPERATING INCOME EUR 43.9‍​ MILLION VERSUS EUR 36.3 MILLION (RESTATED) YEAR AGO
* FY NET INCOME GROUP SHARE EUR 25.0‍​ MILLION VERSUS EUR 19.8 MILLION YEAR AGO (RESTATED)
* SEES 2018 NEGATIVE CURRENCY EFFECT OF 0.7 PCT‍​ * SEES 2018 OPERATING MARGIN TO PROGRESS TO SITUATE ITSELF ABOUT 10.5 PERCENT OF REVENUE
* SEES 2018 RESTRUCTURING CHARGES TO NOT EXCEED 0.5 PERCENT OF REVENUE Source text: bit.ly/2Fket7x Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
